title: Special Saag
ingredients: ['1 (2.5cm) piece fresh ginger, peeled and coarsely chopped', '6 cloves garlic', '4 tablespoons water or more as needed', '1/2 teaspoon garam masala', '285g fresh spinach, chopped', '285g fresh kale, chopped', '250ml milk', '225g cottage cheese', '1 pinch salt', '1 pinch ground nutmeg', '2 teaspoons ghee (clarified butter)', '2 onions, chopped']
